
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
dinamonds <- read_csv('diamonds.csv')
glimpse(dinamonds)  #que tipo de de datos se estan leyendo
dinamonds
```
inciso 1 Dispersion

```{r}
# 1.1
dispersion_1 <- ggplot(dinamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price))+
  geom_point()
dispersion_1

#1.2
dispersion_2 <- ggplot(dinamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price, color = clarity))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_y_log10()

#1.3
dispersion_2



```
